content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not agree on a final price because the potential tenant's offer of 700 Euros per month was below my asking price of 850 Euros per month, which I believe reflects the market value, quality, and location of the property.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Yi-Nuo Wang, as a 7.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not feel discriminated or offended.
name: Peter Schmidt
